Name: Base Station License, Rachel's Car Service, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Rachel’s Car Service, Inc., submitted as Rachel’s Car Service Inc. and also identified as Rachel’s Limo Service Inc. and Rachel’s C/S Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Rachel's Car Service, Inc., submitted as Rachel's Car Service Inc. and also identified as Rachel's Limo Service Inc. and Rachel's C/S Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 548 East Second Street in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      �2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#908
